Address.value: 3891 RANCHERO DRIVE,SUITE 150, ANN ARBOR, Michigan, 48108, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Esperion Therapeutics Inc is a pharmaceutical company. It specializes in developing and commercializing accessible, oral, once-daily, non-statin medicines for patients struggling with elevated low-density lipoprotein cholesterol. The firm has the business of researching, developing and commercializing therapies for the treatment of patients with the elevated low-density lipoprotein cholesterol operating segment.
